caption:
This photograph presents a moody, overcast street scene focusing on a police car marked with the number "15" on its roof. The car is seen from the back with a focus on its top, featuring two red rotating lights and a centered forelight. Through the rear windshield, two figures can be barely made out, one apparently wearing a hat, suggesting they might be police officers.

In the blurred background, urban architecture is visible which includes a distinguished building with towers further down the road, and even further in the distance, a faint, iconic dome-shaped building, recognizable as the United States Capitol in Washington, D.C. Other vehicles with their headlights on suggest a busy, possibly dusky time of day, contributing to the subdued lighting and the overall somber tone of the image. The setting evokes a sense of routine vigilance or surveillance, typical of a capital city's atmosphere.
title: In follow-up of two-car accident officers take both drivers into police car for questioning and writing up of accident report.
